website_summaries.verdict: Sporting her movie-accurate costume and a stern expression, this inexpensive and durable Wonder Woman doll looks great during playtime or on your shelf.

customer_reviews.title: Outfit is flimsy. Looks best in the box.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two. Was too excited about the movie, I wanted one to open. Meh. The "armor" is a cheap fabric. The belt is loose, prob because I cut a plastic tie best left in place. Her tiara and breast piece has to be plastic tied to stay on. It's not fun to play with cause her outfit is not secure. She looks good in the box though, so it's worth getting for displaying in it. I guess. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Swampgirl

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!  Beautifully sculpted and looks like gorgeous Gal Gadot
customer_reviews.text: This is a second 12 inch figure of the movie version of Wonder Woman. I bought the first version of the doll last year at the time of the movie's release. I couldn't resist buying this second version - this has an even greater resemblance to the wonderfully gorgeous Gal Gadot. Buy it if you are a Wonder Woman fan or you have fallen in love with Gal Gadot - it's wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: James Wee Tiongham

customer_reviews.title: A good deal for the price ($14.30)
customer_reviews.text: The sculpting is really great on this figure, and the paint job is high quality too. The armor is a bit flimsy and cheap, however. It looks good on display, but I'm not quite sure how well it'll endure if someone is actually playing with the toy. Also, the packaging came a little scuffed up and battered, so collectors be warned!
customer_reviews.author: electroaddict

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Looking Action Figure
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking action figure. I bought it for my wife who loved the movie. She typically doesn't like this sort of thing (I don't think she owns any other action figures). But, when she saw this one, she thought it looked great and really liked all the detail and accessories (though it is too bad it doesn't come with the shield and the sword). She said (coyly) that it would make a great stocking stuffer. So, I grabbed one for her before they ran out. Only problem is that it's big, so I guess I'm going to have to buy her a bigger stocking. Hmmmm...maybe that was part of her plan?!?
customer_reviews.author: TonyTop Contributor: The Lord of the Rings

customer_reviews.title: Wonder Woman action figure for both boys and girls !
customer_reviews.text: I won't know until Yule if child likes the Wonder Woman action figure. Hopefully, their dog won't find it first. Wonder hero cartoons are watched, so hopefully will like this. From what I can see thru the box, it looks great. Even the magic lasso to get the captive to speak only the truth. It's not the Lynda Carter action figure, but it's still brand name Wonder Woman. I think it's really cool ! For both boys and girls ! Here are photos. 🎄🎁🎅
customer_reviews.author: Incubus-Nihilist

customer_reviews.title: Nicely Made Action Figure, Poorly Made Outfit
customer_reviews.text: Nice doll, well made with posable joints; doll is aesthetically good-looking having muscle tone & long, rooted hair—so why did they totally cheap-out with the outfit? Not only are the boots slit in the back fir cost effectiveness, the outfit is so flimsy, within a week, Wonder Woman became a total flasher. With this doll, the outfit’s barely hangin’ in there.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Ramone

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes it but everything is so lose. The part around the skirt wiggles everywhere and pulls the already short skirt up higher. The arm pieces constantly fall of too. It's good for the value but those are some issues we had right out of the gate.
customer_reviews.author: savannah

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice -just like the pictures.
customer_reviews.text: I am returning the first one because of extensive damage to the box....I mean extensive. It is a present for my niece and I cannot send it to her in this condition. The doll however was exactly what I was looking for and the price was very reasonable. Let's hope Amazon makes this right - they are very good at customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Looks realistic
customer_reviews.text: This Barbie Wonder Women doll is great. Looks beautiful. The outfit is perfect. I feel that any little girl that admires Wonder Women would be very happy with this Barbie. This Barbie is pretty enough that you can display it.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old daughter loves comic book heroes, so we got her this wonder woman action figure. She loves it, takes it with her everywhere, even sleeps with it. The only problem we had were the arm cuffs bend easily, and don't tighten back up. We've lost 1 arm cuff, and the other one is fairly loose. We may just need to "lose" that one as well...
customer_reviews.author: R H

customer_reviews.title: Great body and face hair and costume not so great...
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. I really love the body and articulations. I do wish however they could combine the body with the mold of the Barbies head and intricacies. I actually used the body from this figure and the head of the Batman v Superman Barbie wonder woman’s head and costume.. a thousand times better.. plus I molded the bustier onto her frame as well as the bracelets and gladiator skirt
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Fultz

customer_reviews.title: Wonder Woman
customer_reviews.text: She's a little stiff. Her range of motion is not that great, but she is articulated. Everything on her can come off of her. She kind of reminds me of Cher. One of her hands is curved to hold a weapon. She's got a lot of hair on her head. I think her eyes are brown.
customer_reviews.author: CatOfNineTales

customer_reviews.title: You will want more than one of these.  Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I have now purchased two of these. One for a doll cake because my daughter in law loves Wonder Woman and one for her daughter to play with because she begged me after she saw it. The face is truly beautiful and the hair is fabulous. One of Disney's better dolls and so reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Alice S.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer be ware
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife to put on her desk at work. Nice action figure but not as advertised. States it is “Combat ready”. Does not include her sword which is used frequently in the movies. Her hand is set up to accept, just no sword included.
customer_reviews.author: T. J. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved this doll
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this doll. She's more of a Barbie, pink, princess type little 4 year old so buying this for her was a happy moment for me. I was upset because every store I went to had to WW doll for $40-50! That's insane. Happy to have purchased it online for a lot less and receive something of great quality.
customer_reviews.author: alondra

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughters (3 and 5 years) LOVE this doll!
customer_reviews.text: My two little granddaughters love this doll! They play with her and Queen Hypolita’s (I’m sure I spelled that wrong .. sorry) horse (separate purchase) by the hour .. Arrived super quick and in perfect condition! Thank you, Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this doll! She's very pretty and looks alot like Gal Gadot. Well made! I'm definitely happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerTraci

customer_reviews.title: Blue eyes Wonder Woman
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t a realistic action figure. It has blue eyes and a doll look to it, oppose to a figurine look. It’s much more suited for a toddler than a collector, which was the intended purchase. A female empowering super hereo is always a great toy idea.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Boiko

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: My great granddaughter was playing very creatively with her Barbies and I wanted her to have a stong woman in her collection.
customer_reviews.author: genya

customer_reviews.title: My girls love it! Perfect replica & easy to bend & play with her
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Wonder Woman (along with a few other Wonder Woman dolls) for Christmas for my daughter, and she absolutely loves it. Both of my daughters love to play with her the most because she is so moveable/bendable. She has several spots where she bends ie: knees, elbows, hands, feet, abdomen etc. and my kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lacee

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I surprise my daughter actor as wonder woman was born same year and month of my daughter she love even she 33 years and got promote at her job. This made her more excite wow grow woman still like to be treat like a kid lol
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a last min addition to my daughter's Birthday presents. She loves it even though she is only 5 and never watched the movie or TV shows. All she needs to know is that Wonder Woman saves the world like Spiderman. Product quality is there!
customer_reviews.author: Kristle Marie Tartas

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for all ages
customer_reviews.text: For my daughter but I feel strength when I see it! :)
customer_reviews.author: IMANJ

customer_reviews.title: IMHO Not worthy of Wonder Woman: Cheap dress and unusable lasso
customer_reviews.text: Given the cost compared to other figures in the series, I expected something better than a cheap printed 'dress' and a plastic molded 'lasso'. The dress I could have overlooked, but the fact the lasso can't even unroll is a deal breaker. Back it goes!
customer_reviews.author: kittenspawn

customer_reviews.title: WOW VERY NICE!!!! A+++
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift and it has been well received. Good scale, and fine detail. RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.author: DaPoppa1

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter love it
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews on several different super hero dolls and this by far had the best feedback. I agreed with the other reviews stating the quality of this item. My 10 year old granddaughter loved it and said it was her favorite doll.
customer_reviews.author: SandyD

customer_reviews.title: Something odd about this doll...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this and I love the detail in it. 3 stars because my daughter took off her boots and we discovered that she has 2 left feet. 🤣
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Olive

customer_reviews.title: I wasnt expecting it to be like that cause I thought itll be like the regular ...
customer_reviews.text: My first reaction was Sheesh this is actually big! I wasnt expecting it to be like that cause I thought itll be like the regular sized barbie dolls. The body is solid and the clothes and arm band is tied to the body with clear elastic bands so they wont fall off easily. The paint on the face is clear and she looks like the original wonder woman on carotoon series. I just didnt like the dress, I whink they could use a better material and I think the paint on the boots would chip off over time. Over all it was indeed a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Lexine Syke Avila

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with purchase. Box that doll is in was torn in several places. Looks like someone tried to open it. This is a gift for a collector. Can't send back birthday in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: buttonsforme

customer_reviews.title: True to original Wonder Woman
customer_reviews.text: Well made and true to original wonder women style. Granddaughter loves.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality doll
customer_reviews.text: Why are all dolls not made this sturdy? The legs and arms are sculpted so she actually looks like a real person. Feminine but strong. I am so happy I got this for my daughter - compared to her other barbie and Disney dolls in the same size category, this doll take the top prize.
customer_reviews.author: Alchemist

customer_reviews.title: How do I give a gift that looks like this?
customer_reviews.text: It looks like someone smashed the box with much intent and effort.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Whitlock

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: She looks like good quality. Bought for Xmas gift for my granddaughter
customer_reviews.author: Do

customer_reviews.title: Super cute doll with very detailed costume and accessories
customer_reviews.text: Super cute doll with very detailed costume and accessories! Her hair had sort of uncurled by the time she arrived at my house-- guess she was in a battle getting there! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas shopping
customer_reviews.text: An early Christmas purchase for a grown lady who is still a Wonder Woman fan. Very pleased with this doll and will be proud to present it to my loved one come the holiday.
customer_reviews.author: Alta B.Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Cool doll
customer_reviews.text: Great looking doll. She is on display at my home. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Stanfield

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't look like Wonder Woman
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter for Christmas. I really wish I would have sent it back and got the Barbie one. It just looks cheap and nothing like Wonder Woman.
customer_reviews.author: Jeng

customer_reviews.title: Fake News!
customer_reviews.text: This wonderful opportunity of a lifetime was cut short by false advertising, stating the product was new but the box was extremely damaged/ and obviously wasn't new. There by making it impossible to store as a collectable. There by losing all real value to prospectors
customer_reviews.author: brett k.

customer_reviews.title: Happy child
customer_reviews.text: My goddaughter loves Wonder Woman and I was trying to find her a doll she didnt have. She was so happy and excited when she opened it. It turned out jt was the one she wanted all along
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Nedland

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this doll my daughter worships Wonder Woman And it was the perfect doll for her! I made the doll the centerpiece of the cake
customer_reviews.author: EricaNunnink

customer_reviews.title: Great Wonder Woman doll!
customer_reviews.text: Great doll. Love the non-traditional body type - she has beautiful leg and arm muscles, and looks strong like a superhero should, and beautiful like Wonder Woman should. Good quality, and my daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Nice Doll
customer_reviews.text: I thought the doll was well-made. I actually bought it to give to toys for tots. So I hope that some child is enjoying this product

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this doll. It’s good quality and looks like Wonder Woman.

customer_reviews.title: She's o.k.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like that the outfit was cloth. The Barbie version has the leather/plastic version which looks much nicer.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Cauley

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my niece, who pretty much likes any doll with pretty hair she can brush; so I figured, why not get her one with pretty hair that also kicks ass? Love this toy :)

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my nine year old niece as a gift.

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars

customer_reviews.text: This item was of quality and in a realistic you.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift 🎁
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty doll. Her hair is super soft. She seems to be kinda tall. She's absolutely fun!

customer_reviews.title: Really great doll.
customer_reviews.text: Super like her. Hair is awesome, outfit is cool. We shopped a great while, glad we settled on this one.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great price, fast shipping, product is as described. I would recommend to anyone. Very happy with this.

customer_reviews.text: Great doll and good price. Super fast shipping. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Winner!
customer_reviews.text: My girls love this doll. Made with great quality. They do her hair, move her arms and legs. Outfit is worthy, too.

customer_reviews.title: pleased

customer_reviews.title: It is a doll with the WW theme and clothing

product_meta.title: Battle-Ready WONDER WOMAN Doll
product_meta.description: Celebrate Wonder Woman and her new movie with this highly collectible, 12" true to scale deluxe fashion figure. She is stunning and powerful in her iconic warrior outfit with signature boots, headdress, upper armband, lower arm cuffs, gold belt and Lasso of Truth. With richly authentic details, and poseable arms and legs, she is perfect for display and action play. You can also choose Diana Prince in her elegant blue evening gown with pulled back hair and a concealed sword. These unique fashion dolls make superior additions to your collection! Each sold separately, subject to availability.
feature_bullets: 12" deluxe Wonder Woman fashion doll inspired by the new movie
Highly authentic Amazon Warrior outfit with signature boots, headdress, upper armband, lower arm cuffs, gold belt and Lasso of Truth
Perfect for fashion play, display and collecting
You can also choose Diana Prince in her luxurious blue evening gown with a concealed sword. Each fashion doll sold separately, subject to availability

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars735 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
